articles.author: Lim Hui Jie, Shreyashi Sanyal
articles.title: Hong Kong, China markets slide in the wake of Evergrande liquidation order - CNBC
articles.description: Investors in Asia continue to grapple with the fallout from the liquidation of Evergrande, as well as assessing Japan's unemployment numbers for December
articles.content:
Vietnam's economy is in a "pretty good position" this year, said VinaCapital chief investment officer Andy Ho, who expects growth between 6% and 7% this year.
